'''Lickilicky''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ベロベルト''' ''Berobelt'') is a {{type|Normal}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation IV]].

It [[Evolution|evolve]]s from {{p|Lickitung}} when [[level]]ed up while knowing {{m|Rollout}}.

==Biology==
Lickilicky is a dark pink, rotund Pokémon with a small tail and a long tongue. It has a yellow line pattern on its belly and a white bib-like pattern, making it almost resemble a round baby boy. It also has what appears to be a curled appendage on its head. It has a big appetite. It can lick anything or anyone close by for any leftover crumbs. Its saliva contains a numbing solvent and can decompose anything, and it wraps its long tongue around things, like its prey, to coat them with its sticky saliva. It has space in its throat to store saliva, and it can also roll up its tongue and store it there. 

Lickilicky lives in forests with a large body of water. It uses its tongue with more skill than it would its hands and feet, and a current record of its stretch length reaches 82 feet.

==In the anime==
[[File:Conway Lickilicky.png|left|thumb|250px|Lickilicky in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
Lickilicky debuted in ''[[M10|The Rise of Darkrai]]''. Its Trainer, [[Baron Alberto]], was also briefly turned into a Lickilicky, earning him the temporary pun moniker "Baron Lickilicky".

Lickilicky made its main series debut in ''[[DP098|If the Scarf Fits, ''Wear'' It!]]'', where it evolved from a {{p|Lickitung}} that was left in the {{pkmn|Day Care}}.

[[Conway]] has a Lickilicky that was used in ''[[DP185|Working on a Right Move!]]'' during his battle with {{Ash}}. It almost defeated {{AP|Gible}}, but was taken down by {{AP|Noctowl}} after Ash switched him out.

===Minor appearances===
A Lickilicky is owned by one of the students of {{ci|Snowpoint}} {{pkmn|academy|Trainers' School}} in ''[[DP126|Classroom Training!]]''.

A {{pkmn|Coordinator}}'s Lickilicky was used in the [[Contest Battle|Battle Stage]] of the {{to|Daybreak}} {{pkmn|Contest}} along with a {{p|Weavile}} in ''[[DP162|Playing the Performance Encore!]]''.

A Lickilicky was used alongside a {{p|Rattata}} in a [[Double Performance]] during the [[Sinnoh Grand Festival]] in ''[[DP174|Last Call — First Round!]]''.

A Lickilicky made a brief appearance in ''[[DP182|An Old Family Blend!]]'', under the ownership of a {{pkmn|Trainer}} competing in the [[Lily of the Valley Conference]].

[[File:Kit Lickilicky.png|thumb|200px|Lickilicky in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In The Rise of Darkrai manga===
Lickilicky, as well as the Lickilicky form of [[Baron Alberto]], appear in the manga adaption of the 10th [[Pokémon movie]], ''{{ma|The Rise of Darkrai}}''.

===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
{{main|Kit}}
After a wild Lickitung stole Diamond's map (among others belonging to passerby citizens), {{adv|Diamond}} fought it with [[Don|his Shieldon]], but he evolved into Lickilicky and became even more difficult to catch. In ''[[PS390|Licking Lickitung]]'', by utilizing the {{DL|Pokétch|Dowsing Machine}} and {{DL|Pokétch|Pedometer}} apps on his Pokétch, he captured him and named him [[Kit]]. He was then helpful for rescuing one of [[Professor Rowan]]'s assistants when his lab was attacked by [[Mars]]' swarm of {{p|Yanmega}}.

===In the Phantom Thief Pokémon 7 manga===
Hiori used a Lickilicky to open one of Rocco's puzzle doors in ''[[P7-03|Challenge From A Rival]]''.

==Trivia==
* Lickilicky would have been obtainable in both [[Generation II]] and [[Generation III]] if it had existed, as in both there was a possible way to get a {{p|Lickitung}} that had {{m|Rollout}}. It shares this trait with {{p|Mamoswine}}.
* Despite having a clearly visible tail, Lickilicky belongs to [[List of Pokémon by body style|a group of Pokémon]] which lack tails.
* Lickitung's Japanese name is romanized as ''Beroberuto'' in [[M10|The Rise of Darkrai]].

===Origin===
Similar to its pre-evolution {{p|Lickitung}}, it may be based on lizards like iguanas and chameleons due to its long tongue and somewhat reptilian appearance. On the other hand, Lickilicky’s bulbous body makes it resemble a round baby. Moreover, considering the white bib-like pattern on Lickilicky’s torso and Lickilicky’s voracious appetite, Lickilicky may be based on an exaggerated concept of a bloated gourmand, perhaps dressed in {{wp|Macaroni (fashion)|macaroni}}-style or {{wp|dandy}}-style fashion.

====Name origin====
Lickilicky is a repetition of ''lick'' in the slang form, ''licky''.

Berobelt may be any combination of べろ ''bero'' (tongue), ベロベロ ''berobero'' ({{wp|onomatopoeia}} for licking), and べろっと ''berotto'' (licking or sticking out one's tongue).
